page.title: 03THE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content:
In the early seventies the Leisure Centre was opened.It is called The Magnet.Before the Leisure Centre was built Maidenhead possessed an outdoor swimming pool which could only be used in warm weather.Now we have an indoor pool which is open all the year.
There are many interesting things that you can do at the Leisure Centre. There are squash and badminton courts,a sauna and hairdressers,a bar and cafe.There is also a very large sports hall that is used for very large functions as well as sports. There are plans to extend the Leisure Centre and build a small theatre but whether these will materialise time will tell.
